small.description: a [b]tight[/b], [i]shadowed[/i] space where the walls seem to whisper. Magic lingers in the still air, close and tense.

medium.description: a [b]comfortably open[/b] area, wide enough to breathe yet still enclosed. Movement feels [i]natural[/i], with space to pause and plan.

large.description: an [b]expansive[/b] chamber that stretches well beyond the eye’s first glance. Echoes take their time returning, and steps feel [i]lighter[/i] here.

huge.description: a [b]colossal[/b] void where size itself becomes [i]disorienting[/i]. The boundaries are distant, the scale humbling—like walking through a dream too big to hold.
